title: Reds i need you (referal question)

embed.description: So basically i'm planning on making a smurf for the purposes of Drunk games (i will level it to ARAM level sober and then only play while drunk cause why not?) Would i be allowed to Self Refer for this or would i be allowed to be \"refered\" by a friend in the creation of said smurf?

body:
Cause apparently you guys don't seem to go onto the Help&support area to check your average post i'm copy pasting this here basically, cause i kinda want to know ASAP.

So basically i'm planning on making a smurf for the purposes of Drunk games (i will level it to ARAM level sober and then only play while drunk cause why not?)

Would i be allowed to Self Refer for this or would i be allowed to be "refered" by a friend in the creation of said smurf?

I figure why not have it be referred

replies.body:
You play LoL when drunk...?

wat

I plan to make this account for this purpose (i was dared to do a league drinking game and it sounds fun and i would totally do it on a regular basis)

What is wrong with playing league while drunk?
A league drinking game? Sounds interesting.
I will be posting from said smurf on these boards most likely about the drinking game

very nice. I used to know a guy on NA who smoked weed while carrying hard as AD sona. good times
You're not allowed to refer yourself but, to my knowledge, another person referring your smurf isn't against any rules.

Ok, scratch what I just said.

Here's the link to the rules for "Bring-A-Mate" - http://rewards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/terms-and-conditions
And basically you can't refer smurfs. At all.
> The referred individual must not have had a previous LoL Player account or be a current LoL Player for purposes of the referral.

That seems rather stupid, especially considering the person i would get to refer me was the actual person who got me into league (we just never had RaF at the time.

Oh well time to make random drunkness anyway and get it to 6.

I legitimately referred a decent number of people who have gone on the spends hundreds of dollars on the game!
But the system wasn't in place then; qq.

I've legitimately referred at least 10 people, but yeah as you said, this system is in place WAY to %%%%ing late.

Anyone that any of us can refer have probably already been referred to the game by now.
Until we all start breeding, or our nieces/nephews/younger cousins turn 13 :D.

Also, any theories on what this is referring to;
>RIOT GAMES RESERVES THE RIGHT TO PROSECUTE ANY FRAUDULENT REFERRALS TO THE FULLEST EXTENT OF THE LAW.
?

Is that their right to ban your account despite money spend if you break the rules.
Pretty sure that means they can take legal action against you if you break the rules. Though it's probably unlikely to happen to anyone.
They have the right to ban your account regardless of money anyway.
